value_claims.claim_title: Developers save 1-3 hours per week with JetBrains AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 37% of survey respondents reported saving between 1 and 3 hours per week by using JetBrains AI Assistant in their development workflows.
value_claims.source_quote: A significant 37% noted saving between 1 and 3 hours per week
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly attributed to using JetBrains AI Assistant as measured in user survey

value_claims.claim_title: 22% of developers save 3-5 hours per week with AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 22% of survey respondents reported saving between 3 and 5 hours per week using JetBrains AI Assistant, representing significant productivity gains.
value_claims.source_quote: an additional 22% saved between 3 and 5 hours
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly measured and attributed to AI Assistant usage in survey responses

value_claims.claim_title: 4% of developers save more than 8 hours per week
value_claims.claim_description: 4% of users (23 people) reported saving more than 8 hours per week with JetBrains AI Assistant - equivalent to an entire working day.
value_claims.source_quote: 4% of users (23 people) claimed to free up more than 8 hours per week. That's an entire working day!
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Extreme time savings directly attributed to AI Assistant usage by survey respondents

value_claims.claim_title: 91% of developers save time using AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 91% of survey respondents reported saving time by using JetBrains AI Assistant, demonstrating broad productivity impact across the user base.
value_claims.source_quote: We were thrilled to hear that 91% of respondents had been saving time by using JetBrains AI Assistant.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings directly attributed to AI Assistant usage across majority of surveyed users

value_claims.claim_title: 75% user satisfaction rate with JetBrains AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 75% of surveyed users reported being satisfied with JetBrains AI Assistant, with 25% reporting they are 'very satisfied', indicating strong product-market fit.
value_claims.source_quote: 75% of users who took our survey are happy with JetBrains AI Assistant. Even better – 25% of them say they're 'very satisfied'.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Satisfaction directly attributed to AI Assistant features and performance

value_claims.claim_title: 78% of developers spend less time on information searches
value_claims.claim_description: 78% of developers reported spending less time searching for information when using JetBrains AI Assistant, improving research efficiency.
value_claims.source_quote: 78% of developers find they spend less time on their information searches.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Reduced search time directly attributed to AI Assistant's ability to provide contextual answers

value_claims.claim_title: 71% of developers complete tasks faster with AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 71% of surveyed developers reported completing their development tasks much faster when using JetBrains AI Assistant.
value_claims.source_quote: Tasks are completed much faster for 71% of them
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Faster task completion directly attributed to AI Assistant features and automation

value_claims.claim_title: 55% of developers engage in more exciting projects
value_claims.claim_description: 55% of developers reported being able to dive into more exciting projects as a result of time saved using JetBrains AI Assistant.
value_claims.source_quote: 55% are diving into more exciting projects as a result of all the time they're saving.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time saved by AI Assistant enables developers to take on more strategic work, though AI is not directly performing the exciting projects

value_claims.claim_title: 58% of users experience easier task completion and reduced mental strain
value_claims.claim_description: 58% of AI Assistant users reported experiencing easier task completion and reduced mental strain in their development workflows.
value_claims.source_quote: AI Assistant enhances workflows, with 58% of users experiencing easier task completion and reduced mental strain.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cognitive benefits directly attributed to AI Assistant reducing complexity and automating routine tasks

value_claims.claim_title: 49% of developers report better focus with AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: 49% of surveyed developers reported experiencing better focus when using JetBrains AI Assistant in their development work.
value_claims.source_quote: Almost half of the respondents reported better focus and the ability to achieve a flow state more easily, with those figures at 49% and 46% respectively.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Better focus attributed to AI Assistant handling routine tasks and reducing context switching

value_claims.claim_title: 46% of developers achieve flow state more easily
value_claims.claim_description: 46% of developers reported being able to achieve a flow state more easily when using JetBrains AI Assistant.
value_claims.source_quote: Almost half of the respondents reported better focus and the ability to achieve a flow state more easily, with those figures at 49% and 46% respectively.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Flow state achievement facilitated by AI Assistant reducing interruptions and automating routine tasks

value_claims.claim_title: Junior developers save 3-5 hours per week with AI Assistant
value_claims.claim_description: Developers with less than two years of coding experience benefit most from JetBrains AI Assistant, saving between 3 and 5 hours per week.
value_claims.source_quote: developers with less than two years of coding experience seem to benefit the most from JetBrains AI Assistant, saving between 3 and 5 hours per week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time savings for junior developers directly attributed to AI Assistant providing guidance and automation

value_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant is fastest-growing commercial tool in JetBrains portfolio
value_claims.claim_description: JetBrains AI Assistant became the fastest-growing commercial tool ever in JetBrains' portfolio following its December 6 launch.
value_claims.source_quote: JetBrains AI Assistant is deeply integrated into JetBrains development environments, code editors, and other products...has since become the fastest-growing commercial tool ever in JetBrains' portfolio.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Growth rate directly attributed to AI Assistant adoption by JetBrains user base

value_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant reduces task time from 30-40 minutes to 3-5 minutes
value_claims.claim_description: Customer reported AI Assistant handles short tasks in 3-5 minutes of agent time that would have taken 30-40 minutes of manual work.
value_claims.source_quote: I tend to use it for short tasks that take 3–5 minutes of agent time, which would have taken me 30–40 minutes of work.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time reduction directly attributed to AI Assistant automating specific development tasks

value_claims.claim_title: Junie speed increased by 30% since Gartner research
value_claims.claim_description: JetBrains increased Junie's processing speed by 30% following the Gartner Magic Quadrant research period.
value_claims.source_quote: Since Gartner's research, we've increased Junie's speed by 30%
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Speed improvement directly attributed to Junie AI agent optimization

context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains officially launched AI Assistant on December 6, 2023, marking entry into AI-powered development tools market.
context_claims.source_quote: JetBrains joined the AI race on December 6 after the official launch of AI Assistant

context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains conducted survey with 640 AI Assistant users to measure impact and satisfaction.
context_claims.source_quote: The survey collected answers from 640 people.

context_claims.claim_title: Primary users are developers and engineers
context_claims.claim_description: 84% of survey respondents work as developers or engineers, representing the core user base for AI Assistant.
context_claims.source_quote: The majority of respondents (84%) work as developers or engineers.

context_claims.claim_description: 65% of survey respondents have full-time employment, with 16% self-employed and 12% freelancers.
context_claims.source_quote: As for employment, 65% have full-time jobs, 16% are self-employed, and 12% work as freelancers.

context_claims.claim_title: 59% of users have 10+ years coding experience
context_claims.claim_description: Majority of AI Assistant users are experienced developers, with 59% having over 10 years of coding experience.
context_claims.source_quote: When it comes to experience in coding, 59% of respondents have been doing it for over 10 years.

context_claims.claim_title: Primary markets are US and Germany
context_claims.claim_description: Survey respondents primarily from US (16%) and Germany (11%), indicating key geographic markets.
context_claims.source_quote: Most of them are from the US (16%) and Germany (11%), with other countries making up smaller percentages.

context_claims.claim_title: 56% of users had 1+ month experience with AI Assistant
context_claims.claim_description: More than half of survey respondents had been using AI Assistant for over a month, indicating established usage patterns.
context_claims.source_quote: More than half of the people in the survey (56%) had been using the JetBrains AI Assistant for more than a month when they answered the questions.

context_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant powered by OpenAI and JetBrains models
context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains AI Assistant uses both OpenAI's language models and proprietary JetBrains models.
context_claims.source_quote: It is currently powered by both OpenAI's and JetBrains's models

context_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant available across JetBrains IDE portfolio
context_claims.claim_description: AI Assistant integrated into all commercial JetBrains IDEs, ReSharper, and Fleet as of version 2023.3.
context_claims.source_quote: AI Assistant is available in the 2023.3 versions of all our commercial IDEs and ReSharper, as well as in Fleet

context_claims.claim_title: JetBrains positioned as neutral LLM provider
context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains working to integrate multiple LLMs to act as neutral provider, not locked into single vendor.
context_claims.source_quote: the company is working on integrating other LLMs to act as a neutral provider

context_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant supports software development lifecycle
context_claims.claim_description: AI Assistant provides features across development workflow including coding, refactoring, documentation, testing, and commit messages.
context_claims.source_quote: AI-powered code completion, debugging, and generative explanations to accelerate every stage of the software development life cycle
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and maintain information technology solutions

context_claims.claim_title: Technical preview phase preceded general availability
context_claims.claim_description: AI Assistant went through technical preview phase with limited users before December 2023 public launch.
context_claims.source_quote: The AI Assistant is still in the technical preview stage and is available only to a limited number of people.

context_claims.claim_description: AI Assistant available as supplemental feature requiring JetBrains AI service subscription for paid product customers.
context_claims.source_quote: AI Assistant is available for customers of paid editions of our products today as a supplemental feature requiring a JetBrains AI service subscription.

context_claims.claim_title: 60% of developers familiar with AI code generation tools
context_claims.claim_description: According to JetBrains State of Developer Ecosystem 2023 report, 60% of developers already familiar with AI code generation tools.
context_claims.source_quote: According to our State of Developer Ecosystem 2023 report, 60% of developers are already familiar with AI code generation tools

context_claims.claim_title: JetBrains recognized in 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant
context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains AI (including AI Assistant and Junie) recognized in 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for AI Code Assistants.
context_claims.source_quote: This year, JetBrains's AI (including both AI Assistant and Junie) was recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for AI Code Assistants

context_claims.claim_title: Privacy-first approach with no training on user data
context_claims.claim_description: Junie never trained on user data, with no data retention on JetBrains servers or through subcontractors.
context_claims.source_quote: Unlike other models, Junie is never trained on user data, so customer privacy is never compromised. We also never retain data on our servers or through subcontractors.

context_claims.claim_title: Partnership with OpenAI and Google Cloud
context_claims.claim_description: JetBrains partnered with OpenAI for GPT models and Google Cloud for Codey/Vertex AI integration.
context_claims.source_quote: AI Assistant is currently powered by OpenAI and by our own models...We are also working on integrating Google LLMs

context_claims.claim_title: AI Assistant supports .NET development in ReSharper
context_claims.claim_description: AI Assistant integrated into ReSharper for .NET development with Visual Studio integration.
context_claims.source_quote: AI Assistant boosts ReSharper's already impressive code analysis and refactoring capabilities by injecting an extra layer of intelligence
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and maintain information technology solutions
